segments.text: I see the water spilling over, and it’s making me feel a little sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting all wet and messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and it’s just adding to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it’s so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, and it’s just making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the water is going to ruin everything if it keeps going like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but in here it’s just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand looking at this anymore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just gross and careless.
segments.speaker: PAR
